io.github.nozyx12.jalog

Interface LogListener


  • public interface LogListener
    The LogListener interface defines methods to handle different levels of logging events. Implementations of this interface can be registered to a Logger to receive notifications for info, debug, warning, and error logs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDebug(java.lang.String content)
      Called when a debug-level log is generated.
      void onError(java.lang.String content)
      Called when an error-level log is generated without an associated throwable cause.
      void onError(java.lang.String content, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Called when an error-level log is generated with an associated throwable cause.
      void onInfo(java.lang.String content)
      Called when an info-level log is generated.
      void onWarning(java.lang.String content)
      Called when a warning-level log is generated.

    • Method Detail

      • onInfo

        void onInfo(java.lang.String content)
        Called when an info-level log is generated.
        Parameters:
        content - the log message.

      • onDebug

        void onDebug(java.lang.String content)
        Called when a debug-level log is generated.
        Parameters:
        content - the log message.

      • onWarning

        void onWarning(java.lang.String content)
        Called when a warning-level log is generated.
        Parameters:
        content - the log message.

      • onError

        void onError(java.lang.String content,
             java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Called when an error-level log is generated with an associated throwable cause.
        Parameters:
        content - the log message.
        cause - the exception that caused the error.

      • onError

        void onError(java.lang.String content)
        Called when an error-level log is generated without an associated throwable cause.
        Parameters:
        content - the log message.
